voterAnonymity: We take voter anonymity very seriously. We only ask you to log in with your uOttawa email to let us know that you have voted but <1>we can never trace back to who you voted for.</1>
browsers: We recommend viewing this website through Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome (or a browser based on Chromium), Microsoft Edge or Safari.
login: Log in with your uOttawa email
invalidVoter: Sorry {{name}}! You're not on the list of valid voters. If you believe this is a mistake, email {{contactEmail}}
invalidEmail: Sorry, {{name}}! {{email}} is an invalid email, please sign in with your uOttawa email.
